div.p: ONLINE USER: As long as you don't drink alone... you're in no danger of having a problem.
RAY: People with alcoholism often drink alone, but that doesn't mean you can prevent it by sticking to the buddy system. Drinking alone is an indicator of a problem, not the cause it...
RAY: People having a heart attack have chest pains, but no one would say, "You can prevent a heart attack by not having chest pains."
